description: All required supporting documentation and tender related information must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on 10 October 2023 valu to 20 bid after 2 PM EST The  of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) issued this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL For activities to support current DRDC initiatives located in climate region
full_summary:
=====================

### Request for Proposal: Applications of AI in Cyber Mission Assurance

**Call Number:** WS4047617069

**Deadline for Tender Submission:** October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST (Extended by Amendment 6)

**Request for Proposal Overview:**
The Canadian Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the acquisition of Research and Development (R&D) services aimed at supporting Defence Research and Development Canada's (DRDC) current initiatives in the Cyber Mission Assurance (CMA) domain.

**Contract Details:**
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Services Required:** R&D services to support current DRDC initiatives in the Cyber Mission Assurance (CMA) domain
- **Location of Work:** Valcartier, Québec, Canada
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
- **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Specified

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria:**

- Technical Merit
- Price

**Request for Proposal Documents:**

- Tender Document
- Contract and Payment Terms
- Annex A: Technical Requirements

**Submission Requirements:**

- Proposals must be submitted electronically to the link provided below.
- Proposals must be received by 2:00 PM EST on October 10, 2023.
- Late submissions will be automatically declared non-responsive.

For more information, please refer to the full [Request for Proposal (RFP) document](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16894943?extsite=MTY4OTQ5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or visit the procurement website for the [Canadian Public Works and Government Services (SPAC)](http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/).

Mail queries to:
Julie Desforges
SPAC/PSPC

Contact Phone:
No contact information available.

Procurement Agency Contact:
Defense Research and Development Canada (DRDC)

Email: [julie.desforges@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.desforges@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 

### Important Dates:
- Amendment 6 (September 29, 2023)
- Tentative Contract Start Date: Not Specified

### Classification
* UN SPS Code: 81141902 (Application or technology research and development service)
* GHSS/IMAS:
